name: Mask of the Stitched Demon

explicitModifiers.text: +(40-50) to Intelligence
+(160-180) to maximum Energy Shield
Strength provides no bonus to Maximum Life
Intelligence provides no inherent bonus to Maximum Mana
+1 to Maximum Life per 2 Intelligence
Cannot gain Energy Shield
Regenerate 1% of Life per second per 500 Maximum Energy Shield
Your Energy Shield starts at zero

flavourText:
From the flesh of the gods, Xibaqua was born.
From the carnage of Xibaqua, we were born.
It is our duty to return to the gods what was once theirs.

name: Mask of the Spirit Drinker

explicitModifiers.text: (140-220)% increased Armour and Energy Shield
+(30-60) to maximum Energy Shield
+(80-100) to maximum Life
Cannot gain Energy Shield
Regenerate (50-150) Life per second if you have at least (500-1500) Maximum Energy Shield
Your Energy Shield starts at zero

name: Slavedriver's Hand

explicitModifiers.text: +(30-40) to Dexterity
(200-250)% increased Evasion and Energy Shield
(20-30)% reduced Trap Throwing Speed
Skills used by Traps have (10-20)% increased Area of Effect
Increases and Reductions to Cast Speed also Apply to Trap Throwing Speed

10% chance to gain an Endurance, Frenzy or Power Charge when any
of your Traps are Triggered by an Enemy
Skills which throw Traps Cost Life instead of Mana

flavourText: A plan without a deadline stays a plan.

name: Architect's Hand

explicitModifiers.text: +(30-40) to Dexterity
(201-250)% increased Evasion and Energy Shield
(20-30)% reduced Trap Throwing Speed
Increases and Reductions to Cast Speed also Apply to Trap Throwing Speed
(4-6)% chance to throw up to 4 additional Traps

flavourText:
Great works take time.

<default>{This item can be transformed on the Altar of Sacrifice along with Vial of Dominance}

name: Fate of the Vaal

explicitModifiers.text: (180-210)% increased Physical Damage
(10-15)% increased Attack Speed
100% of Physical Damage from Hits with this Weapon is Converted to a random Element
Hits with this Weapon always Ignite, Freeze, and Shock
Hits with this Weapon deal (30-60)% increased Damage to Ignited Enemies
Hits with this Weapon deal (30-59)% increased Damage to Frozen Enemies
Hits with this Weapon deal (30-60)% increased Damage to Shocked Enemies

flavourText:
Doryani promises immortality, yet we build great structures, 
carve magnificent works into stone, so a part of us lives onward.
A sign of faithlessness through action.

name: Story of the Vaal

explicitModifiers.text: (180-210)% increased Physical Damage
(10-15)% increased Attack Speed
50% of Physical Damage from Hits with this Weapon is Converted to a random Element
Hits with this Weapon always Ignite, Freeze, and Shock
Hits with this Weapon Freeze Enemies as though dealing (151-200)% more Damage
Hits with this Weapon Shock Enemies as though dealing (150-200)% more Damage
Ignites inflicted with this Weapon deal (50-75)% more Damage

flavourText:
Through war we found peace. Through death we found advancement.
Our ancestors did not know where their actions would take them.
Are we any better?

<default>{This item can be transformed on the Altar of Sacrifice along with Vial of Fate}

name: Apep's Supremacy

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (50-55) to (72-80) Chaos Damage
+(130-150) to maximum Energy Shield
(30-50)% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge
You take Chaos Damage instead of Physical Damage from Bleeding
+25% chance to be Poisoned
+3% to all maximum Resistances while Poisoned
Poisons on you expire 50% slower

flavourText: Give him your body, and your burdens will follow.

name: Apep's Slumber

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (50-55) to (72-80) Chaos Damage
+(80-100) to maximum Energy Shield
+25% chance to be Poisoned
+3% to all maximum Resistances while Poisoned
Regenerate 80 Energy Shield per Second per Poison on you, up to 400 per second
Poisons on you expire 50% slower

name: Dance of the Offered

explicitModifiers.text: +(50-60) to maximum Mana
+(25-30)% to Lightning Resistance
25% increased Movement Speed
You have Onslaught while not on Low Mana
The Agnostic

flavourText:
Facing their death,
the mind of a sacrifice
retreats into instinct and madness.

<default>{This item can be transformed on the Altar of Sacrifice along with Vial of the Ritual}

name: Omeyocan

explicitModifiers.text: (15-20)% increased maximum Mana
+(25-30)% to Lightning Resistance
30% increased Movement Speed
20% increased Evasion Rating per 500 Maximum Mana
You have Onslaught while not on Low Mana
Lose 7% of Mana per Second

flavourText:
Only a fool seeks meaning
in a life so fleeting.

name: Coward's Legacy

explicitModifiers.text: +(15-24) to all Attributes
(5-10)% increased Movement Speed
50% increased Effect of Curses on you
You count as on Low Life while you are Cursed with Vulnerability
You are Cursed with Vulnerability

flavourText:
Death is your most important duty.
Face it, or curse your bloodline for all eternity.

name: Coward's Chains

explicitModifiers.text: +(15-20) to all Attributes
(5-12)% increased Movement Speed
Damage of Enemies Hitting you is Unlucky while you are Cursed with Vulnerability
You count as on Full Life while you are Cursed with Vulnerability
You are Cursed with Vulnerability

name: Zerphi's Heart

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (48-53) to (58-60) Chaos Damage
Items and Gems have 50% increased Attribute Requirements
Chaos Damage can Ignite, Chill and Shock
Gain Soul Eater for 20 seconds when you use a Vaal Skill

flavourText: We are incapable of change without sacrifice, for we are both the iron and the forge.

name: Sacrificial Heart

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (22-27) to (34-38) Fire Damage
Adds (20-23) to (31-35) Cold Damage
Adds (1-3) to (47-52) Lightning Damage
Gain up to maximum Power Charges when you use a Vaal Skill
Gain 10 Life per Enemy Hit if you have used a Vaal Skill Recently
10% increased Movement Speed if you have used a Vaal Skill Recently

flavourText:
The seed of life, saved and savoured.

<default>{This item can be transformed on the Altar of Sacrifice along with Vial of Sacrifice}

name: Transcendent Spirit

explicitModifiers.text: -1 Dexterity per 1 Dexterity on Allocated Passives in Radius
3% increased Movement Speed per 10 Dexterity on Allocated Passives in Radius
+125 to Accuracy Rating per 10 Dexterity on Unallocated Passives in Radius
2% reduced Movement Speed per 10 Dexterity on Unallocated Passives in Radius

flavourText:
Take comfort knowing that, even in death,
we may serve our Queen and fuel her empire.

name: Transcendent Flesh

explicitModifiers.text: -1 Strength per 1 Strength on Allocated Passives in Radius
+7% to Critical Strike Multiplier per 10 Strength on Unallocated Passives in Radius
3% increased Life Recovery Rate per 10 Strength on Allocated Passives in Radius
2% reduced Life Recovery Rate per 10 Strength on Unallocated Passives in Radius

flavourText:
We are as much shaped by what we do
as what is done to us.

name: Transcendent Mind

explicitModifiers.text: -1 Intelligence per 1 Intelligence on Allocated Passives in Radius
+3% to Damage over Time Multiplier per 10 Intelligence on Unallocated Passives in Radius
3% increased Mana Recovery Rate per 10 Intelligence on Allocated Passives in Radius
2% reduced Mana Recovery Rate per 10 Intelligence on Unallocated Passives in Radius

flavourText:
A keen mind sees what others do not,
makes connections where others do not, 
and is dangerous in a way that others are not.

name: Tempered Spirit

explicitModifiers.text: -1 Dexterity per 1 Dexterity on Allocated Passives in Radius
2% increased Movement Speed per 10 Dexterity on Allocated Passives in Radius

flavourText:
Though the body rots, the spirit lives on.

explicitModifiers.text: -1 Strength per 1 Strength on Allocated Passives in Radius
2% increased Life Recovery Rate per 10 Strength on Allocated Passives in Radius

flavourText:
We are born raw and untested, and we are shaped by life.

<default>{This item can be transformed on the Altar of Sacrifice along with Vial of Transcendence}

name: Tempered Mind

explicitModifiers.text: -1 Intelligence per 1 Intelligence on Allocated Passives in Radius
2% increased Mana Recovery Rate per 10 Intelligence on Allocated Passives in Radius

flavourText:
Any thought, no matter how fleeting, changes the thinker.

name: Soul Ripper

explicitModifiers.text: +(-39-90) to Maximum Charges
Loses all Charges when you enter a new area
Consumes Maximum Charges to use
Gain Vaal Souls equal to Charges Consumed when used

flavourText:
"What care have I for their pain? They're already dead."
- Atalui, Vaal Priestess

name: Soul Catcher

explicitModifiers.text: Cannot gain Mana during effect
(60-80)% increased Critical Strike Chance with Vaal Skills during effect
(60-80)% increased Damage with Vaal Skills during effect
Vaal Skills used during effect have 10% reduced Soul Gain Prevention Duration

flavourText:
Freedom is for the privileged, even in death.
